text: was a Japanese-born Brazilian artist. Her work includes paintings, prints and sculptures. She was one of the main representatives of informal abstractionism in Brazil. Her son, Ruy Ohtake, was also an architect. Ohtake died in São Paulo, Brazil at the age of 101 from heart failure. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1913 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Japanese artists Category:Brazilian centenarians Category:People from São Paulo Category:People from Kyoto Prefecture
title: Tomie Ohtake
